name: Yasoda Jayaweera
content: Dr Yasoda Jayaweera | Introduction | Brunel University London Skip to Content Home People Dr Yasoda Jayaweera Dr Yasoda JayaweeraLecturer (Education) Computer Science Wilfred Brown 108 Email: yasoda.jayaweera2@brunel.ac.uk Tel: +44 (0)1895 268294 Computer Science College of Engineering, Design and Physical Sciences Summary Yasoda Jayaweera joined the Department of Computer Science, Brunel University in 2020. She completed her PhD in 2022 with a thesis titled "Methodology for identifying alternative solutions in a population based data generation approach applied to synthetic biology". Her research is mainly focused on application of optimisation methods and machine learing to improve design in synthetic biology. Qualifications PhD, Brunel University London MSc Data Science and Analytics, Brunel University London BSc (Hons) Information Technology, University of Moratuwa, Sri Lanka Associate Fellow of the Higher Education Academy, UK Responsibility Level 4 (UG 1st year) Coordinator Newest selected publications Gilbert, D., Heiner, M., Jayaweera, Y. and Rohr, C. (2017) 'Towards dynamic genome scale models'. Briefings in Bioinformatics, 20 (4). pp. 1167 - 1180. ISSN: 1467-5463 Open Access Link Journal article More publications(1)
